Text:
Hello Thanks for the awesome torrent! I was wondering if you have or know where I can find the Yes live at Yes the International Amphitheatre, Chicago,IL. on June 9, 1979. Please let me know if you have it or know where i can find it. If you do have it and are willing to upload it I would greatly appreciate it!!!

Thx!!!!
Hi If you search through a couple other Yes discographies the live Yes you are looking for called Chicago of Heaven is available I believe under two posts
